N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2409.2 - Partial payments

State Regulations
(a) Where
a recipient of an award under this Subchapter withdraws from attendance or
reduces his attendance below full-time status before incurring a full tuition
liability for that term of attendance, the award to which he was otherwise
entitled under this Subchapter may still be made on his behalf based upon the
tuition liability actually incurred. In no event shall the award exceed the
lesser of the tuition charge actually incurred (including, where applicable, educational fees and room and board) or the maximum amount of award eligibility
for that term. (b) Receipt of any
partial payment pursuant to this section shall be counted as payment for a full
term of attendance in determining a recipient's future eligibility for an
award. Notes
